items.sentence: Tom was able to persuade Mary not to do that.
Tom told me that Mary had decided to do that.
Tom told Mary to do that as soon as possible.
Tom told Mary that he'd be unable to do that.
Tom told Mary that he'd be likely to do that.
Tom knew he might need to do that by himself.
Tom knew he might have to do that by himself.
Tom is the only one who felt like doing that.
Tom is probably too depressed to do that now.
Tom is likely to still be willing to do that.
